title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions:
1. Cook pasta in boiling salted water
2. Fry pancetta until crispy
3. Whisk eggs and cheeses together
4. Drain pasta, mix with pancetta
5. Remove from heat, add egg mixture
6. Season with black pepper

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions:
1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 2 hours
2. Grill or bake chicken pieces
3. Fry onions and garlic until soft
4. Add spices and tomatoes, simmer
5. Add cream and cooked chicken
6. Garnish with fresh coriander

title: Vegetable Lasagna
summary: Layers of pasta, roasted vegetables, and creamy béchamel sauce.
instructions:
1. Roast vegetables with olive oil
2. Cook lasagna sheets al dente
3. Layer sheets, vegetables, ricotta and tomato sauce
4. Top with parmesan
5. Bake at 180°C for 40 minutes
6. Garnish with fresh basil

title: Beef Bourguignon
summary: Classic French stew with beef slow-cooked in red wine.
instructions:
1. Brown beef in batches
2. Cook bacon until crispy
3. Sauté vegetables
4. Deglaze with wine
5. Add all ingredients to pot
6. Simmer for 3 hours until tender
